name: study of christmas cookies blanket
notes:
give yourself the gift of extra time with a merry make-ahead! this year's summer crochet along is all about indulging in those fulfilling festive projects that might take more time to work up, without the pressure of the holiday countdown. mikey's study of christmas cookies blanket captures the whimsy and nostalgia of holiday memories, with stunning stitch-work and a festive palette of red heart soft to keep you engaged.

materials
red heart® soft™ (5 oz/141 g; 256 yds/234 m)
contrast a off white (4601) 1 ball
contrast b rose blush (9770) 1 ball
contrast c turquoise (2515) 1 ball
contrast d really red (9925) 1 ball
contrast e wheat (9388) 1 ball
contrast f guacamole (4420) 1 ball
contrast g dark leaf (9523) 1 ball

measurement
approx 47" [119.5 cm] diameter.


[week 1 pdf][1]
